remarks: Restriction of a direct product (dropping factors).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dprdres.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dprdres.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dprdres.3 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ I ) $.
dprdres $p |- ( ph -> ( G dom DProd ( S |` A ) /\ ( G DProd ( S |` A ) ) C_ ( G DProd S ) ) ) $.
